name: Audio to Text Transcription
author: Shinkai
description: This tool transcribes audio files to text using the faster-whisper model.

compute_type.description: Compute precision for the model ("int8", "float16", "int8_float16"). Default : "int8"

device.description: Device to run the model on ("cpu" or "cuda"). Default : "cpu"

model_name.description: Whisper model size to use (e.g., "base", "large-v3", "distil-large"). Default : "base"

audio_file_path.description: Path to the audio file to transcribe

transcript.description: The transcription text of the audio
